sentences.sentence: The zoning page can be reached using the far right button in the group on the bottom lefthand corner of the window.
sentences.translation: 使用窗口左下角最右侧的按钮可以访问到分区页面。

sentences.sentence: The young woman was breezing along in the lefthand lane when suddenly, and without warning, she made a sharp right turn and almost slammed into another car.
sentences.translation: 年轻女子在左边车道上轻快地开着车。突然，也没有任何指示，她向右急拐，险些撞上另一辆车。
